info.name: YKT-dark
info.description: Description A css file for Stylus to make Ykt.ru services dark and friendly for your eyes. This project is a dark version of YKT website. How to contribute Clone this project on GitHub and start your changes. If you want to use styles from source code, then create new style in Stylus extension and put source code in opened window. How to use this style? You need Stylus extension installed on your browser to use this style.
info.additionalInfo: Support for more services like Dnevniki, News and Forums
